column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love Caf√©-Ba-Ba-Reeba. It has a great menu and such a vibrant atmosphere. I've come here a number of times with rather large groups and still had great service. The dates
column4: and beef tenderloin are some of my favorites. The sangria is great too - I'd recommend the standard red or white over the flavored versions.
